description.title: What is Image Resizer?
description.text: Image Resizer is a free, fast, and secure online tool that allows you to change the dimensions of your images. Whether you need to resize for social media, a website, or email, this tool makes it easy to get the exact size you need without sacrificing quality.

howTo.title: How to Use Image Resizer
steps: Upload an image by dragging and dropping or clicking the upload area
Enter your desired width or height in pixels
Keep 'Maintain aspect ratio' checked to prevent distortion
Click 'Resize Image' to process the file

questions.q: Is my image uploaded to a server?
questions.a: No, all resizing is done entirely within your browser using JavaScript. Your photos never leave your device.
Resizing down (making smaller) generally maintains quality. Resizing up (making larger) may cause some pixelation, but our tool uses high-quality algorithms to minimize this.
We support all common web image formats including JPEG, PNG, and WebP.
